raw_comment:
What do you notice?
I noticed that there;s a higher percentage between the players of color and the head coaches of color.  
What do you wonder?
I wonder why is there a low percentage of head coaches of color?

What impact does this have on you and your community?
This impacts the community because it shows a lack of equality between the Players and the coaches.  Also because so many black people have a dream of becoming successful yet they have to worry about it might not happening because of the color of their skin.

What’s going on in this graph? Write a catchy headline that captures the graph’s main idea.
"Sports and its Lack of Diversity"
ace_sentences: I notice a higher percentage of players of color than head coaches of color.
I wonder why the percentage of head coaches of color is low.
This situation shows a lack of equality between players and coaches.
Many black people have a dream of becoming successful.
Some black people worry that this dream might not happen because of the color of their skin.
The headline is: Sports and its lack of diversity.
